actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendments, H. Rept. 94-1663.

official_title: A bill to study certain lands in the Sierra National Forest, Calif., for the possible inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendments, H. Rept. 94-1663) Designates approximately 22,500 acres in the Sierra National Forest in California as the Kaiser Wilderness, making such area a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

titles.title: A bill to study certain lands in the Sierra National Forest, Calif., for the possible inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System.
